comments:
While trying to extract an interface in my code, I got an error telling me to look at the logs. Inspecting the logs suggests an infinite recursion. While I can't share the code that caused this, I hope that with this stack trace you will be able to spot the way in which the code entered this infinite recursion.

Z

- which Eclipse version?
- is this reproducible? if so, please try with more memory

As the Header says, 3.2 (though not 3.2.1). I tried several times, and they all gave the same result. I have it configured for 1.4Gb of heap (though I did not change the stack). It does definitelly look like an infinite recursion to me...
Could you please provide exact details on how to reproduce this: example code/project?
Verified that the SOE is indeed fixed in M6
